divs: Sighting DetailsNot being able to sleep I was looking out of the window at a friend60s house when I noticed a row of dim red lights about a mile away towards theWelsh hills at about 50-100 feet up.As it moved slowly towards me I noticed itwas reflecting the orange street lights that it was aproaching.A half mile awaynow,I could clearly see red lights evenly dotted around it60s disc form.As it passed over me I could see the streets reflected in it60s underside very clearly.There was no sound.THe next day or the day after I told a friend who then asked his mother to tellher story.The same night,at the same time she was walking her dog who started toyelp and bark and run in circles.She looked up to see the streets and park shewas in reflected in a circuler object,encircled by red lights.She watched it move slowly over her and off towards the north sea,northeasterly.It made no sound.We both knew we60d seen a UFO.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hoylake
This sighting has never been favorited.
